title: Movie Trivia Challenge
description: Test your knowledge of classic films!

questions.question: Which film won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020?
options: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

questions.question: Who played the character of Tony Stark in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?
In which year was the first 'Star Wars' movie released?
Who directed the 'Lord of the Rings' trilogy?
Which actress played Katniss Everdeen in 'The Hunger Games' series?

title: TV Shows Quiz
description: How well do you know your favorite series?

questions.question: Which TV show features a chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer?
In 'Friends', what is the name of Phoebe's twin sister?
Which TV series is set in the fictional continent of Westeros?
Who plays the character Eleven in 'Stranger Things'?
